item.description: In April, instead of having a book discussion, we’re having movie night! We’ll go see Water for Elephants at Cinema World on the John Fitch Hwy on Thursday, April 28th at 7:00pm. The move run time is two hours - so it should end at 9pm. The tentative  plan is to meet at Ixtapa Cantina in Lunenburg ( 308 Massachusetts Avenue - across the street from Walmart) after the movie – Ixtapa closes at 10pm on Thursday, so by the time we get over there that would give us about 45 minutes to hang out and discuss! (Suggestions for other places to meet are definitely welcome!) Water for Elephants was our very first book club discussion in February of 2010, and coincidentally we met at Ixtapa! If you weren’t at the first discussion and haven’t read the book, read it for this month if you’d like so we can compare the two. If you’re not up for it, reading the book is definitely not required!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be waiting right inside the front doors. Be there at least 10 minutes prior to movie time!
item.name: Movie Night - Water for Elephants
